{"id":1588463307,"question_id":3657,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"7 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1743100797,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"233 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1588463307/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Check if Grid can be Cut into Sections","memory":"245 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool checkValidCuts(int n, vector<vector<int>>& rectangles) {\n        vector<pair<int, int>> xs, ys;\n        for (auto i : rectangles) {\n            xs.push_back({i[0], 1});\n            xs.push_back({i[2], -1});\n            ys.push_back({i[1], 1});\n            ys.push_back({i[3], -1});\n        }\n\n        sort(xs.begin(), xs.end());\n        sort(ys.begin(), ys.end());\n        \n        int count = 0;\n        int ans = -1;\n        for (auto i : xs) {\n            count += i.second;\n            if (!count) \n                ans++;\n        }\n        if (ans >= 2)\n            return true;\n\n        count = 0;\n        ans = -1;\n        for (auto i : ys) {\n            count += i.second;\n            if (!count) \n                ans++;\n        }\n        return (ans >= 2);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"check-if-grid-can-be-cut-into-sections","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":1082}
